short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to scrape any recipe on the web and save it to Megroplan!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can scrape and save any recipe from the web to Megroplan.  Just click the Save to Megroplan button in the extension and you will be redirected to Megroplan website where the recipe will be saved.
